imdb.plot outline: Jef, a former TV show host, mistakenly decides to make a one-hour special. When a burst of inspiration sends him and his crew to the woods, disaster ensues. The crew, now lost, deteriorate both physically and mentally to the point of insanity. Jef discovers through chaos and betrayal the reason he was put on the Earth. When the crew finally find their way out of the forest, they set on a mission to right the wrongs that had been done to them. Little do they know, a similar agenda has been planned by an evil corporation thirsty for world domination.
imdb.title: Jef's Chip Hour
plot: A former TV show host decides to make a one-hour special, and in the midst of chaos and betrayal, he discovers who he truly is.::Zoomer Jones Productions

Jef, a former TV show host, mistakenly decides to make a one-hour special. When a burst of inspiration sends him and his crew to the woods, disaster ensues. The crew, now lost, deteriorate both physically and mentally to the point of insanity. Jef discovers through chaos and betrayal the reason he was put on the Earth. When the crew finally find their way out of the forest, they set on a mission to right the wrongs that had been done to them. Little do they know, a similar agenda has been planned by an evil corporation thirsty for world domination.::Zoomer Jones Productions
